title: Now Urgot and Eve will get their long awaited VGUs. Can we have more info about other candidates?
body:
From Reav3 new blog  http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/01/dev-state-of-champion-update-january-2017/

Now, {{champion:28}} {{champion:6}}  are confirmed to be the next of the ChampUp teams's projects. Hooray to those who main them.

So, Reav3 Meddler and the team , Is it time we have more updated info about other strong candidates like {{champion:82}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:39}} ? Thank You.

replies.body:
We were actually just talking about this the other day as we will have to begin early iteation into possible champions after Eve/Urgot pretty soon. This can and will change over time but I would say the new Tier 1 candidates are

{{champion:84}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:39}} ({{champion:10}} {{champion:25}} Duo Update) {{champion:82}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:80}}

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yghB24Gs,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-31T19:52:15.736+0000)
>
> We were actually just talking about this the other day as we will have to begin early iteation into possible champions after Eve/Urgot pretty soon. This can and will change over time but I would say the new Tier 1 candidates are
> 
> {{champion:84}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:39}} ({{champion:10}} {{champion:25}} Duo Update) {{champion:82}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:80}}

Just curious, but why isn't aatrox in this category?  Do you not consider him in as bad of a place as those or is the plan for him to be handled in a class update?
He would be better suited for a Class update since his art/theme are pretty modern

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yghB24Gs,comment-id=000400040003,timestamp=2017-01-31T20:23:05.942+0000)
>
> He would be better suited for a Class update since his art/theme are pretty modern

What about Jax Reav3?. I mean the kit has not really changed much since beta. nor the visuals. am going to say hes just as outdated as xin zhao.

I think Jax moves up to Tier 2. Tier 2 champs could still get picked over Tier 1s if we have a really solid cool idea for a champion in Tier 2. Tier 1 are just the champions we will prioritize to give VGUs. If we can't find something cool we aren't going to go into production on a champion even if it is Tier 1. Urgot for example has been Tier 1 for longer then some champions that are already getting a VGU or already got one but we didn't want to go into production until we had something that we felt confident would be a better Urgot.

I''m happy to hear you're finally considering Jax to be in need of something.  His visuals especially feel very outdated (specifically the animation on his w) and his kit could use a lot of work.  Mostly he just seems like a really boring fighter with no real thematic.
My question is, what are your thoughts on {{champion:54}} ?  His kit is pretty boring when is ult isn't available and his visuals are pretty bad (his head is actually his nose).  Any plans for him?
Malphite is definitely borderline Tier 1. He might even be Tier 1, this list isn't definitive or final or anything.
What tier is Malzahar?

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yghB24Gs,comment-id=00040004000300000000,timestamp=2017-01-31T21:05:25.994+0000)
>
> I think Jax moves up to Tier 2. Tier 2 champs could still get picked over Tier 1s if we have a really solid cool idea for a champion in Tier 2. Tier 1 are just the champions we will prioritize to give VGUs. If we can't find something cool we aren't going to go into production on a champion even if it is Tier 1. Urgot for example has been Tier 1 for longer then some champions that are already getting a VGU or already got one but we didn't want to go into production until we had something that we felt confident would be a better Urgot.

I really enjoy champion reworks. I think most people appreciate them more than new champion releases. not to take away anything from them but its really interesting to see what you do with our already beloved characters.

so {{champion:266}} player will have to wait a whole year ? no as 3 was already enough...

And will u fix {{champion:62}} decoy ? and add a real passive
i think wukong getting real passive would cause his other abilities to get nerfed which i wouldnt like to get touched :/
is it a joke ? Wukong isnt so strong... he's weak tbh.
He is actually good. He just isn't played much. Please be grateful he is where he is because he's a good spot but if his winrate or playrate grows he may get nerfed.
he's good at low elo... yeah. He's weak... that's why he's never play in competition

But he actually has a 51% winrate in platinum+ and 52% globally. Are you sure you don't just _feel_ he's weak?

http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/monkeyking/platinum

> [{quoted}](name=nbraun80,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yghB24Gs,comment-id=00040004,timestamp=2017-01-31T20:02:08.758+0000)
>
> Just curious, but why isn't aatrox in this category?  Do you not consider him in as bad of a place as those or is the plan for him to be handled in a class update?

Aatrox technically counts as a Tank so maybe he is in the Tank Class update
Aatrox is a divers... as tank he's useless.
Is he not useless as a diver?
No, he's just useless in general.

> [{quoted}](name=nbraun80,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yghB24Gs,comment-id=00040004,timestamp=2017-01-31T20:02:08.758+0000)
>
> Just curious, but why isn't aatrox in this category?  Do you not consider him in as bad of a place as those or is the plan for him to be handled in a class update?

He would be in with the Divers update.  Soon™
No Malzahar :(
{{champion:13}} ?
He's permanently tier 1
They just weave in a Ryze rework in between every few VGU's, just like he does with Q.

He ryzes from every tier.

https://m.popkey.co/eb14b4/WWNXa.gif

How do you even pick the champion who needs a VGU the most?

People would argue that Rammus and Volibear don't really need a VGU while champions like Nunu and Mordekaiser seem to be struggling more.
I did a blog on it awhile back. I would agree that Nunu and Morde need it more, but not quite enough to separate them from Tier 1

Janna could be such a cool character. Her lore paints her as a wind spirit born out of prayers and faith. That alone has so much design potential kit-wise. Not to mention it's been stated she has the ability to transform into a bird. That could also be a super cool spell in a future Janna VGU.

>Valor Bot

>Not to mention it's been stated she has the ability to transform into a bird. That could also be a super cool spell in a future Janna VGU.

I feel like there's an ulterior motive here.

As far as I remember it's a combination of thematic, gameplay and art reasons as to why they're looked at as high priority.

For Rammus and Volibear specifically They're likely high candidates due to incredibly binary, stat-check playstyles and not so great in game art. Rammus has this to a much more severe degree than Volibear but he's not exactly in all that great of a spot either. I mean he's basically just a bear and the whole lightning part of his theme is WOEFULLY underused.

Who  is going to be working on the {{champion:28}} rework? and what are your thoughts on stealth now? Allot of changes were made to how stealth works in the game. {{champion:28}} stealth used to be really powerful compared to other stealth champs, but even though her passive was buffed(it's no longer canceled when she takes dmg) her Passive seems to be on the weaker side of stealth compared to other champs.
Currently the core pod on Eve is Stashu, LoneWingy and JohnODyin

Please ask them to not forget out her mains when reworking her. There aren't very many of us, but we love {{champion:28}} very much. Please don't turn her into to someone else like riot did with {{champion:78}} .

New Poppy's character is an example of Riot's design Philosophy.
League of Legends characters HAVE to be pretty, it's all Riot will ever settle for. 
It's kind of sad, but it's the way it is. 
Riot could have kept Poppy's badass character, but she had to be cutesy. 
It's a shame really, a lot of champions used to have a lot of potential.  

I have no doubts this new Eve will be another boring un-original idea from the design teams.

There are not very many of us Eve mains out there. We are so few in fact that we are outnumbered, but thirsty little shits that care about nothing but getting a spank-bank champ. If you go onto threads talking about Eve you will find over half saying she needs to be a sexy BDSM succubus vampire that wears as little clothes as possible. Then you look at their champ mastery or op.gg and see that none of them have even played eve before, but sure as fuk think they know who she is better than any Evelynn main..

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yghB24Gs,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-31T19:52:15.736+0000)
>
> We were actually just talking about this the other day as we will have to begin early iteation into possible champions after Eve/Urgot pretty soon. This can and will change over time but I would say the new Tier 1 candidates are
> 
> {{champion:84}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:39}} ({{champion:10}} {{champion:25}} Duo Update) {{champion:82}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:80}}

Just saw this from the reddit comment (thanks for the post btw)

On the list you mentioned, are they in any particular order? (from first to get updated to last?) If so, there are a few champions that i simply can't see a reason to be in the same list as they are not as bad as the others. Akali, Voli and Rammus are the ones i am specifically talking about, but kayle and morgana also don't need the work as badly as the others. If you look at Rammus and Voli, they are extremely more "cohesive" and "recent" looking compared to panth and mordekaiser (what are those?? (feet)) 

I think looking at the list, i think Cho, Morde, Mundo and Swain need work sooner than everyone else. Xin, panth, Nunu, and Irelia being the next ones. All the others after that.
They are not in order.
Actually, it appears to be largely alphabetical!
Pantheon isn't he is too manly for that.
Just wondering if you could say anything about why Irelia is on the list? To me her kit is perfect as is, but I'd love to hear your thoughts.

I have talked about this before so you could probably search my post history. Basically she is very stat-checky right now and she is also not really delivering on the "Telekinetic Blade" fantasy very well. We think a modern execution of her gameplay archetype has a ton of potential. This is similar to old Fiora. New Fiora is delivering much better on the "Grand Duelist" Fencing fantasy then old Fiora was, who was also very stat-checky.
Random question: Would Riot ever change a champion's name in a rework?
I can't predict the future but my gut says no

Just out of curiosity, does Ahri ever come up in discussions about champs who need some work? I'm acknowledging straight up that her kit's aged just fine for the most part (I wouldn't cry if her passive and W were replaced completely), I'm just curious since she's my main.
I think Ahri is in a really good spot at the moment
I hope you will consider it. Voli(bear) is so on the nose and unoriginal (which is the opposite of LOL). I'm down for him to be "Voli"

Wow, I am actually surprised to find someone to share pretty much the exact same opinion as me, right under this answer!

99,8% are saying ''Voli'' all the time anyway, which also fits all the other very consistent names very well, may it be ingame or in general. The ''-bear'' also sounds so silly & unthreatening, while it is clear, that he is a bear anyway.
